title: Lesbian Vampire Strippers: Wicked Competition
description: The lesbian vampire strippers of Topaz strip club are going to a big stripper competition out of town. Janelle meets a cute girl from an opposing team during practice, but after a little too much alcohol she accidentally outs herself and the other dancers as vampires. Now Eden, Janelle, and their friends have to bring their A game to the big contest while dealing with nasty competitors and a growing fear that they may end up on the business end of a stake.
author: Aziza Amador
